name: Extreme Drift Car Racing
description:
It's time to leave your skid marks on the asphalt! Keep your thumb on the throttle pedal and drift through 12 realistic tracks with high performance racing cars. Download the best FREE drift racing game ever!

Features:
- High quality 3D graphics and Drift control
- Use separate handbrake button to start drifting
- You can select different setups for every car - Stock, Turbo, Racing, Drift
- 3 mobile Control.
- 14 different modified cars.
- 5 drift racing tracks; Training, Garage, Day and Night Port area.
- Modified cars , police car
- Color and smoke modified

and more free download extreme drift - modified drift racing game!
Thanks for everything..
